pdhp278:1: vācānurakkhī manasā susaṁvṛto kāyena yo akuśalaṁ na sevati।
pdhp278:2: etettayo kaṁmapathe viśodhiya prāppojja so śāntipadaṁ anuttaraṁ ।।
pdhp282:1: kāyena saṁvṛtā dhīrā vācāya utta cetasā ।
pdhp282:2: sabbattha saṁvṛtā dhīrā te ve suparisaṁvṛtā ।।
pdhp283:1: porāṇam etaṁ ādhora na etaṁ ahunā-r-iva ।
pdhp283:3: bahubhāṇikaṁ pi nindanti nāsti loke anindito ।।
pdhp284:1: na cābhu na ca bhaviṣyati na cetarahi vijjati ।
pdhp285:1: yañ ca bālā adhaṁmaṭṭhaṁ pūjeyu garaheyu vā ।
pdhp285:2: aviñūṁ avibhāvāya na taṁ atthāya kāyaci ।।
pdhp286:1: yaṁ ca viñū praśaṁsanti anuvicca suve suve ।
pdhp287:1: nikkhaṁ jāṁbūnadasseva ko taṁ ninditum arihati ।
pdhp287:2: devā pi naṁ praśansanti brahmuṇā pi praśaṁsito ।।
pdhp288:2: sādhurūpī naro hoti iśśukī maccharī śaṭho ।।
pdhp289:1: yamhi saccaṁ ca dhammo ca viratī saṁyyamo damo ।
pdhp289:2: sa vāntadoṣo medhāvī sādhurūpī ti vuccati ।।
pdhp290:1: bahuṁ pi ce sahitaṁ bhāṣamāno na takkaro hoti naro pramatto ।
pdhp290:2: gopo va gāvo gaṇayaṁ paresaṁ na bhāgavā śāmaṇṇassa hoti ।।
pdhp291:1: appaṁ pi ce sahitaṁ bhāṣamāno dhammassa hoti anudhammacārī ।
pdhp291:2: rāgaṁ ca doṣaṁ ca prahāya mohaṁ vimuttacitto akhilo akaṁcho ।
pdhp291:3: anupādiyāno iha vā hure vā sa bhāgavā śāmannassa hoti ।।
pdhp292:1: saccaṁ bhaṇe na kujjheyā deyā appā pi yācito ।
pdhp292:2: etehi ttihi ṭṭhāṇehi gacche devāna santike ।।
pdhp293:1: na ve kadāryyā devalokaṁ vrajanti bālā hi bhe na praśaṁsanti dānaṁ ।
pdhp293:2: dhīro tu dānaṁ anumodamāno teneva so devalokaṁ pareti ।।
pdhp294:2: āttano kārakaṁ śantaṁ taṁ jano kurute priyaṁ ।।
pdhp295:2: yaṁ ca bhuñjeya duśśīlo rāṣṭapiṇḍaṁ asaṁyyato ।।
pdhp298:1: na hi śastaṁ suniśitaṁ viṣaṁ hālāhalaṁ tathā ।
pdhp298:2: evaṁ khipraṁ atipāteti vācā dubbhāṣitā yathā ।।
pdhp299:2: yāya chindati āttānaṁ vācaṁ dubbhāṣitaṁ bhaṇaṁ ।।
pdhp300:1: yo hi nindiye praśaṁsati uttavā nindati yo praśaṁsiye ।
pdhp300:2: vicināti mukhena so kaliṁ kalinā tena sukhaṁ na vindati ।।
pdhp301:1: appāmātto ayaṁ kalī yo akkhehi dhanaṁ parājaye ।
pdhp301:3: ayam eva mahataro kalī yo sugatesu manaṁ pradūṣaye ।।
pdhp302:1: śataṁ sahasrāṇi nirabbudānāṁ chattrīśatiṁ paṁca ca abbudāni ।
pdhp302:2: yaṁ ayiragarahī nirayaṁ upeti vācaṁ manaṁ ca praṇidhāya pāpikāṁ ।।
pdhp303:1: kallāṇim eva bhāṣeyā na ’ssa mucceya pāpikā ।
pdhp303:2: mokkho kallāṇiye śreyo muttā tapati pāpikāṁ ।।
pdhp304:1: kallāṇim eva seveyā na ’ssa mucceya pāpikā ।
pdhp304:2: mokkho kallāṇiye śreyo muttā tapati pāpikāṁ ।।
pdhp305:1: vācaṁ bhāṣeyā kallāṇiṁ na ’ssa mucceya pāpikā ।
pdhp305:2: jātaṁ krodhaṁ nivāreyā so biṣabbhi nirujjhati ।।
